title: Whenever I press on the league client button my screen goes black and will zoom in.
body:
Whenever I press on the league client button my screen goes black and will zoom in. As soon as I close league it goes black and goes right back to normal. I've changed display settings and tried to zoom but it won't change

p.s. I've tried reinstalling

https://gyazo.com/f0c29faab754d45a92646994770a280a (Pre client opening)
https://gyazo.com/829bd8330349b1f215ffed6be2d61b49 (After client opening)
https://gyazo.com/a768d02b60e24e2445f9b7e3a0267a9b (After client opening 2)

replies.body:
Hmm.. This looks like a driver issue. I'd recommend [completing a clean install of your display driver.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1) Also, since it looks like your native resolution is pretty low, you may have to resize the client in order to login. You can adjust the client's resolution scaling by holding down the **CTRL** key, then tapping **+** to increase scaling or **-** to reduce scaling.

I hope this helps!

I updated everything and tried this last night and it didn't work. I think it's something with my windows because when I try to troubleshoot the client it's telling me it's incompatible. Guess I'm just going to holdout until Christmas and my new PC

There may be a culprit that isn't immediately obvious but could be apparent after looking at your system logs. If you'd like, you can run a set of system logs with our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can further assist you.
